content: mema s stars about this pattern these adorable little mug rugs were inspired by my mom otherwise known as mema to her grandchildren a video for this project can be found here stars crochet level advanced beginner materials needed hook choose hook size according to yarn choice notes sample mug rugs were made using peaches and cream cotton yarn #4 an i or 5 5 mm was also used yarn just a few yards are needed to make this project many different yarn weights will work such as sport dk worsted and aran however cotton bamboo or linen yarn is suggested yarn needle for weaving in ends only gauge is not crucial for this pattern and will vary depending on yarn and hook used sonja m otto © 2023 stitch abbreviations used in this pattern chain- chain double_crochet- double_crochet half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet round s - round s single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch st- stitch treble_crochet- triple crochet mema s stars page 1 of 2 directions notes mug rugs are made in rnds all joins are made with a slip_stitch chain 2 round 1 work 5 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook join in first st 5 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 in first st work single_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet * in next st work single_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet * repeat from * around join in first st 5 chain 2 space round 3 chain 1 in first st work single_crochet half_double_crochet in next st in next chain 2 space work half_double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet work a half_double_crochet in next st * single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st in next chain 2 space work half_double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet work a half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * around join in first st round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in first st cont to single_crochet until you reach the first chain 2 space in chain 2 space work single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet cont to single_crochet around and work single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in each chain 2 space join in first st cut yarn finishing weave in all loose ends blocking is highly recommended for this project to help your mug rug lay flat ☺ pattern created by sonja m otto mema s stars page 2 of 2
